metadata.title: CVE-2021-21851 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple exploitable integer overflow vulnerabilities exist within theMPEG-4 decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Contentlibrary v1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input at “csgp” decoder samplegroup description indices can cause an integer overflow due to uncheckedarithmetic resulting in a heap-based buffer overflow that causes memorycorruption. An attacker can convince a user to open a video to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
